Binaries (and matching source) for installing ant on MFC build machines,
as well as the files needed to enable the use of the Fedora epel yum repo.

Sudirs here:

apache-ant/
  Source and binary for apache-ant-1.8.2 

ant-contrib/
  Source and binary for ant-contrib-0.6

epel.repo/
  Fedora epel yum repo rpm and gpg key file
